text: War Horse is a 2011 British-American war drama movie directed and co-produced by Steven Spielberg and written by Lee Hall and Richard Curtis, adapted from English author Michael Morpurgo's 1982 novel of the same name. ==References== Category:2011 drama movies Category:2010s war movies Category:American drama movies Category:American war movies Category:American epic movies Category:Movies directed by Steven Spielberg Category:Movies composed by John Williams Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies about horses
title: War Horse (movie)
